text: Stealing Heaven is a 1988 British Serbian romantic drama movie directed by Clive Donner and was based on the novel of the same name by Marion Meade. It stars Derek de Lint, Kim Thomson, Denholm Elliott, Bernard Hepton, Kenneth Cranham, Rachel Kempson, Angela Pleasence, Patsy Byrne, Timothy Watson, Victoria Burgoyne. ==Other websites== * Category:1988 romantic drama movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:Serbian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Clive Donner
title: Stealing Heaven
